title: West Pakistan Agricultural Development Finance Corporation (Recovery of Arrears) Act, 1958
title_en: West Pakistan Agricultural Development Finance Corporation (Recovery of Arrears) Act, 1958
description: Official consolidated text of West Pakistan Agricultural Development Finance Corporation (Recovery of Arrears) Act, 1958 (XVIII of 1958) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement. (1) This Act may be called the
provisions.content:
1
[(2) It shall extend to the whole of the Province of West Pakistan, except the Tribal Areas.]
(3) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Pledging of property to the Corporation and recovery of its dues. (1) Notwithstanding
provisions.content:
anything contained in any other law for the time being in force it shall be lawful for any agricultural
concern, as defined in the Agricultural Development Finance Corporation Act, 1952 (VII of 1952)
(hereinafter called the said Act) to pledge, mortgage, hypothecate or assign to the Agricultural
Development Finance Corporation (hereinafter called the Corporation) established under the said Act,
any movable or immovable property, in order to secure a loan advanced or to be advanced by the
Corporation under the said Act.
(2) The Corporation shall, in accordance with the provisions of the said Act, be competent to
deal with and recover its dues by disposal of any property, pledged, mortgaged, hypothecated or
assigned as aforesaid and nothing contained in any other law shall affect the rights or powers of the
Corporation conferred on it under the provisions of the said Act, or affect anything done or purported
to be done thereunder.

provisions.title: Section 3. Repeal of West Pakistan Ordinance XII of 1957. The West Pakistan Agricultural
provisions.content:
Development Finance Corporation (Recovery of Arrears) Ordinance, 19571 is hereby repealed.
